name: Totes Legitsies Dating Adventure
description:
Point and click "dating sim" style game.

Please play the game in windowed (not fullscreen) as there is a bug with button hitbox alignment on some devices.

The game contains two scenarios, one playing as a character on a first date with someone, and dealing with anxiety from the situation. The second scenario is playing as a friend of someone who suffers from anxiety, and undergoes a minor anxiety attack.

Further documentation regarding the health aims for the project is provided inside the file zip.

Linux and OSX builds are provided, but entirely untested. Windows build "probably" works.

The game has no exit condition, and once dialogue stops appearing, the scenario is over.

NOTE: FUN WITH FRUIT is a bonus game that is provided with the project for funsies. :D
